channel.title: Need experienced programmers
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys, I'm andrew I'm 13 and I wish to start a development team with around 4-6 guys max. What I had in mind was 1 guy is the GFX designer, one guy designs the website and the rest are server sided programmers. What this server is, is a 377 old school blank source and client. Freshly downloaded last night. I had an idea about having a little "Project", and wished to start one since I am a fresh new Java learner, and I just finished a 2,000 page book on Java last night.
Some things about me - - Mild Java experience, due to me studying Java via books on my kindle for about... 6 months - I act older than I am - My skype is Minnesnowta.ftw - I DO have R.S.P.S programming experience - I cooperate well with ideas and other programmers
Here is my vision of the server/client sided team - - 2 People would be the main developers - 1 Person would be like items and NPC programmers - 1 person would be maybe shops, minigames, quests?
Please don't be intimidated by my age, I know i'm 13 but I act more like a young adult.
If you would like to apply for any of those positions please use the formats that I'll give to you in a second.
Server sided developer! Age: Position applying for (Please be specific as there are 3 choices in server sided development): Experience in java: Why should i choose you?: What could you bring to my server?: Proof of work: Skype?:
Web designer! Position Applying for: Name: Age: Skype: Proof of Work: Experience:
GFX designer! Position Applying for: Name: Age: Skype: Proof of Work: Experience:[/center]

item.title: Need experienced programmers
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower

@Loveandpower wrote:

link me to the 377 you downloaded

item.title: Need experienced programmers
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

TehEpicMN:

Thanks for the “help”… I am just a beginner at mopar and this…

I suggest you just start developing stuff for your server first and then ask people to join you. If you want that big team it’s highly recommended that all of you know at least some java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need experienced programmers
item.dc:creator: @TehEpicMN TehEpicMN
item.description:
@TehEpicMN wrote:

Thanks for the “help”… I am just a beginner at mopar and this…

item.title: Need experienced programmers
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I just finished a 2,000 page book on Java last night.
Yet you don't make your own framework.
- 1 Person would be like items and NPC programmers
So, a modeler. That's client sided. Unless you mean changing strengths and weaknesses of NPC's, which is just changing a few variables and could barely be considered programming.
- 1 person would be maybe shops, minigames, quests?
Changing a few numbers falls under the categories of shops. I suppose that having a team for questing and minigames would be decent setup.

Good luck.

Read full topic
